app.title: ShopHub
app.tagline: Your trusted shopping destination. Quality products, great prices, exceptional service.

hero.welcomeDesc: Discover the latest trends and find your perfect style. Shop with confidence.
hero.summerDesc: Get up to 50% off on all summer essentials. Limited time offer!
hero.newArrivalsDesc: Check out our newest products. Fresh designs, premium quality.
hero.freeShippingDesc: Free shipping on orders over 500₺. Fast and reliable delivery.
hero.bestDealsDesc: Don't miss our weekly specials. Shop now and save big!

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.desc: Subscribe to our newsletter and get exclusive offers, new product alerts, and more!
newsletter.thankYouDesc: You've been added to our newsletter. Check your inbox for a special welcome offer!

footer.subscribeDesc: Subscribe to get special offers and updates delivered right to your inbox.

empty.cartDesc: Start shopping to add items to your cart
empty.favoritesDesc: Save products you love for easy access later
empty.searchDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters
empty.ordersDesc: Start shopping to see your orders here

product.failedToAdd: Failed to add item to cart. Please try again.

review.commentPlaceholder: Share your experience with this product...
review.noReviewsDescription: Be the first to review this product!

comparison.minItems: Add at least 2 products to compare

notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

category.title: Category
category.categoryNotFoundDesc: The category you're looking for doesn't exist.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.noFavoritesDesc: Start adding products to your favorites

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.informationWeCollectDesc: We collect information that you provide to us directly, including but not limited to:
privacy.personalInfo: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
privacy.howWeUseDesc: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
privacy.processOrders: To process and fulfill your orders
privacy.communicate: To communicate with you about your orders and account
privacy.improve: To improve our website and services
privacy.promotional: To send you promotional materials and updates (with your consent)
privacy.security: To prevent fraud and ensure security
privacy.dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.agreementDesc: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.useLicenseDesc: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
terms.disclaimerDesc: The materials on this website are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability.
terms.limitationsDesc: In no event shall we be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this website.
terms.revisionsDesc: We may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the current version of these terms of service.

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.methodsDesc: We offer various shipping options to meet your needs:
shipping.freeShippingDesc: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over 500₺ within Turkey. Free shipping applies automatically at checkout for qualifying orders.
shipping.processingTimeDesc: Most orders are processed within 1-2 business days after payment confirmation. During peak seasons, processing may take up to 3-4 business days.
shipping.locationsDesc: We ship to addresses within Turkey and internationally. Shipping costs vary based on destination and shipping method selected at checkout.

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.policyDesc: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. To be eligible for a return, your item must be:
returns.unworn: Unworn and unused with original tags attached
returns.condition: In the same condition you received it
returns.processingDesc: Return requests are typically processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your item. Refunds will be credited to your original payment method.
returns.nonReturnableDesc: The following items are not eligible for return:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.ordering1q: How do I place an order?
faq.ordering1a: Simply browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. Follow the checkout process to complete your order.
faq.ordering2q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faq.ordering2a: You can modify or cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our customer service.
faq.ordering3a: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans for select items. Check the product page for available options.
faq.shipping1a: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express options are available for faster delivery.
faq.shipping2a: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.
faq.shipping3a: Yes, you will receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.
faq.payments1q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.payments1a: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
faq.payments2a: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your payment information.
faq.payments3a: Your payment is processed immediately when you place your order.
faq.returns1a: We offer a 30-day return policy. Items must be unworn with original tags.
faq.returns2q: How do I return an item?
faq.returns2a: Contact our customer service to initiate a return. We will provide you with return instructions.
faq.returns3a: Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer, except in cases of defective items.

trackOrder.title: Track Your Order
trackOrder.description: Enter your order number or tracking ID to check the status of your order

giftCards.title: Gift Cards
giftCards.perfectGiftDesc: Give the gift of choice with our flexible gift cards. They never expire and can be used on any product.
giftCards.receiveEmail: Receive gift card via email instantly
giftCards.redeem: Redeem at checkout with your unique code

help.title: Help Center
help.description: How can we assist you today?
help.liveChatDesc: Chat with our support team for instant help
help.emailSupportDesc: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Welcome to our premium e-commerce platform. We are dedicated to providing you with the highest quality products and exceptional shopping experiences.
about.mission: Our mission is to make online shopping simple, enjoyable, and accessible to everyone.
about.missionDesc: To provide exceptional online shopping experiences by offering quality products, competitive prices, and outstanding customer service to customers worldwide.
about.visionDesc: To become the world's most trusted and innovative e-commerce platform, setting new standards for online retail and customer satisfaction.
about.timeline2020Desc: Started with a vision to revolutionize online shopping
about.timeline2024Desc: Expanded our catalog to over 1 million products
about.qualityFirstDesc: We carefully curate every product to ensure premium quality and customer satisfaction.
about.customerFocusDesc: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We're always here to help you find what you need.
about.trustedCommunityDesc: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us for their shopping needs.
about.fastDeliveryDesc: We offer quick and reliable shipping to get your products to you fast.
about.excellenceDesc: Striving for perfection in everything we do

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.storeDesc: We welcome you to visit our physical store location during business hours.
